basic.floral_language:
Monstera friedrichsthalii
Floriography: fashion, happiness and energy 
Monstera friedrichsthalii is the evergreen foliage plant. It has strong stem, and the aerial root of brown color, which can absorb water and nutrients in the air. Leaves are light green, peculiar shape, looking like a turtle, and coupled with much on stem section, much like bamboo, so it is called bamboo of curvature. Monstera friedrichsthalii is often put in the sitting room, the facade, the beautification adornment effect. 
Monstera friedrichsthalii likes the semi-shade environment, and it is grown in scattered light. Flowers are yellow-white spathe, and are generally difficult to bloom in domestic growth.
basic.blooming: Foliage plants, sometimes flowers in summer
basic.color: Leaf color emerald green , bract light yellow

maintenance.soil: Peat mixed with coarse sand soil or hydroponics
maintenance.sunlight: Relatively resistant to shade, likes half shade environments, leaves are fresh and green with some sunlight in winter
maintenance.watering: Likes wet environments, spray water in the surrounding environment to keep air moist, reduce watering in winter
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions, every 15 days apply fertilizers once in April to Septermber
maintenance.pruning: Remove dead and yellowish leaves timely
